main event: On December 6, 1957, near Nome, Alaska, a round object measuring 6 to 12 inches in diameter was observed for about 20 to 30 seconds.
interesting points: The object had a flat trajectory and a straight flight path,36 civilians reported the sighting,There was a brilliant light reported that may have encompassed several lights,An unusual whistling noise was heard during the event,The object was compared in speed to a mail plane traveling approximately 500 miles per hour.
